workflow.name: Create AI videos from prompts with OpenAI script, TTS & Pexels B-roll assembly
workflow.description:
Automatically creates complete videos from a text prompt‚Äîscript, voiceover, stock footage, and subtitles all assembled and ready.


## How it works

Send a video topic via webhook (e.g., "Create a 60-second video about morning exercise"). The workflow uses OpenAI to generate a structured script with scenes, converts text to natural-sounding speech, searches Pexels for matching B-roll footage, and downloads everything. Finally, it merges audio with video, generates SRT subtitles, and prepares all components for final assembly.

The workflow handles parallel processing‚Äîwhile generating voiceover, it simultaneously searches and downloads stock footage to save time.


## Setup steps

1. **Add OpenAI credentials** for script generation and text-to-speech
2. **Get a free Pexels API key** from pexels.com/api for stock footage access
3. **Connect Google Drive** for storing the final video output
4. **Install FFmpeg** (optional) for automated video assembly, or manually combine the components
5. **Test the webhook** by sending a POST request with your video topic

**Input format:**
```json
{
  "prompt": "Your video topic here",
  "duration": 60,
  "style": "motivational"
}
```


## What you get

- ‚úÖ AI-generated script broken into scenes
- ‚úÖ Professional voiceover audio (MP3)
- ‚úÖ Downloaded stock footage clips (MP4)
- ‚úÖ Timed subtitles file (SRT)
- ‚úÖ All components ready for final editing

**Note:** The final video assembly requires FFmpeg or a video editor. All components are prepared and organized by scene number for easy manual editing if needed.

workflow.name: Prompt-Based AI Video Creation with Auto Script, Voiceover & B-Roll Assembly

parameters.command:
# This is a placeholder for FFmpeg video assembly
# In production, you would use FFmpeg or a video editing API

# Example FFmpeg command structure:
# ffmpeg -i voiceover.mp3 -i video1.mp4 -i video2.mp4 \
#   -filter_complex "[0:a]volume=1.0[a];[1:v][2:v]concat=n=2:v=1:a=0[v]" \
#   -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -c:a aac output.mp4

echo "Video assembly requires FFmpeg installation"
echo "Total scenes: $(ls *.mp4 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "Voiceover files: $(ls *.mp3 2>/dev/null | wc -l)"
echo "Subtitle file: $(ls *.srt 2>/dev/null)"

parameters.content:
## How it works

This workflow transforms a simple text prompt into a complete video with voiceover, stock footage, and subtitles. It uses OpenAI to generate a structured script, converts text to speech, searches Pexels for matching B-roll footage, and assembles everything into video components ready for final editing.

## Setup steps

1. **Add API credentials**: Connect your OpenAI account and Pexels API key (free at pexels.com/api)
2. **Configure Google Drive**: Set up Google Drive OAuth for video storage
3. **Test the webhook**: Send a POST request with your video topic
4. **Install FFmpeg**: Required for final video assembly (or use alternative video editing tool)

**Note**: The final assembly step requires FFmpeg or a video editing service. All components (audio, video clips, subtitles) are prepared and can be manually edited if needed.

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value: Create a 60-second video about the benefits of morning exercise

assignments.name: systemPrompt
assignments.value:
You are a professional video script writer. Create a detailed video script with the following format:

Scene 1:
Voiceover: [What the narrator says]
Visual: [Description of what should be shown]

Scene 2:
Voiceover: [What the narrator says]
Visual: [Description of what should be shown]

Create 4-6 scenes for a {{ $('Set Video Parameters').item.json.targetDuration }}-second video about: {{ $('Set Video Parameters').item.json.prompt }}

Style: {{ $('Set Video Parameters').item.json.videoStyle }}

Make the script engaging, concise, and suitable for stock footage visuals.

parameters.content:
## Input & Configuration

Receives video prompt via webhook and sets parameters like duration, style, and prepares the AI script generation prompt.

## Script Generation

Uses OpenAI to create a structured video script with scenes, voiceover text, and visual descriptions.

## Content Generation

Generates AI voiceover from script and searches Pexels for matching stock footage based on scene descriptions.

## Assembly & Export

Combines audio and video clips, generates SRT subtitles, assembles final video, and uploads to Google Drive.

user.name: Oneclick AI Squad
user.bio: The AI Squad Initiative is a pioneering effort to build, automate and scale AI-powered workflows using n8n.io. Our mission is to help individuals and businesses integrate AI agents seamlessly into their daily operations  from automating tasks and enhancing productivity to creating innovative, intelligent solutions. We design modular, reusable AI workflow templates that empower creators, developers and teams to supercharge their automation with minimal effort and maximum impact.

data.details: Execute command allows you to run terminal commands on the computer/server hosting your n8n instance. Useful for executing a shell script or interacting with your n8n instance programmatically via the CLI.
